entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 p.m. PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
